documents.title: Robust EPSI overview
documents.description: High-level description of the Robust Estimation of Primaries with Sparse Inversion (L1 minimization) MATLAB application, including prerequisites, installation notes, and support information.

documents.title: Example walkthroughs
documents.description: Detailed walkthrough for running bundled examples, data preparation requirements, and usage notes for the Robust EPSI demo scripts.

documents.title: Driver parameter reference
documents.description: Reference table describing every option that can be passed to the EPSI_SLIM_main MATLAB driver, including defaults and behavioral notes.

documents.title: Published MATLAB documentation
documents.description: Auto-generated HTML documentation that mirrors the MATLAB publish output for the Robust EPSI package, covering package organization, setup guidance, and references.

documents.title: Data directory
documents.description: Location of synthetic and field data used by the Robust EPSI examples, including SU and MAT files referenced by the experiments.
